# Karabiner Element

This is keyboard macro utility for MacOS

```json filename="karabiner.json"
{
    "global": { "show_in_menu_bar": false },
    "profiles": [
        {
            "complex_modifications": {
                "rules": [
                    {
                        "description": "Xcode jk to escape",
                        "manipulators": [
                            {
                                "conditions": [
                                    {
                                        "bundle_identifiers": [
                                            "^com\\.apple\\.dt\\.Xcode$"
                                        ],
                                        "type": "frontmost_application_if"
                                    }
                                ],
                                "from": {
                                    "modifiers": { "optional": ["any"] },
                                    "simultaneous": [
                                        { "key_code": "j" },
                                        { "key_code": "k" }
                                    ],
                                    "simultaneous_options": {
                                        "key_down_order": "insensitive",
                                        "key_up_order": "insensitive",
                                        "key_up_when": "any"
                                    }
                                },
                                "to": [{ "key_code": "escape" }],
                                "type": "basic"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "description": "Toggle Full Screen",
                        "enabled": false,
                        "manipulators": [
                            {
                                "from": {
                                    "key_code": "f",
                                    "modifiers": { "mandatory": ["left_control", "left_command"] }
                                },
                                "to": [{ "shell_command": "/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --toggle native-fullscreen" }],
                                "type": "basic"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "description": "Focus next/prev space using Ctrl + Arrow keys",
                        "manipulators": [
                            {
                                "from": {
                                    "key_code": "right_arrow",
                                    "modifiers": { "mandatory": ["left_control"] }
                                },
                                "to": [{ "shell_command": "/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus next" }],
                                "type": "basic"
                            },
                            {
                                "from": {
                                    "key_code": "left_arrow",
                                    "modifiers": { "mandatory": ["left_control"] }
                                },
                                "to": [{ "shell_command": "/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m space --focus prev" }],
                                "type": "basic"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "description": "ESC 누를 때 입력기가 한글이면 영어로 전환 후 ESC",
                        "manipulators": [
                            {
                                "conditions": [
                                    {
                                        "input_sources": [{ "language": "ko" }],
                                        "type": "input_source_if"
                                    }
                                ],
                                "from": { "key_code": "escape" },
                                "to": [
                                    { "select_input_source": { "language": "en" } },
                                    { "key_code": "escape" }
                                ],
                                "type": "basic"
                            },
                            {
                                "conditions": [
                                    {
                                        "input_sources": [{ "language": "ko" }],
                                        "type": "input_source_if"
                                    }
                                ],
                                "from": {
                                    "key_code": "1",
                                    "modifiers": {
                                        "mandatory": ["command"],
                                        "optional": ["any"]
                                    }
                                },
                                "to": [
                                    { "select_input_source": { "language": "en" } },
                                    {
                                        "key_code": "1",
                                        "modifiers": ["command"]
                                    }
                                ],
                                "type": "basic"
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            },
            "devices": [
                {
                    "identifiers": {
                        "is_keyboard": true,
                        "product_id": 591,
                        "vendor_id": 1452
                    },
                    "simple_modifications": [
                        {
                            "from": { "key_code": "delete_forward" },
                            "to": [{ "key_code": "right_shift" }]
                        },
                        {
                            "from": { "key_code": "end" },
                            "to": [{ "key_code": "right_shift" }]
                        },
                        {
                            "from": { "key_code": "home" },
                            "to": [{ "key_code": "right_shift" }]
                        },
                        {
                            "from": { "key_code": "page_down" },
                            "to": [{ "key_code": "right_shift" }]
                        },
                        {
                            "from": { "key_code": "page_up" },
                            "to": [{ "key_code": "right_shift" }]
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ],
            "fn_function_keys": [
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "f3" },
                    "to": [{ "key_code": "mission_control" }]
                },
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "f4" },
                    "to": [{ "apple_vendor_keyboard_key_code": "dashboard" }]
                },
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "f5" },
                    "to": [{ "apple_vendor_top_case_key_code": "illumination_down" }]
                },
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "f6" },
                    "to": [{ "apple_vendor_top_case_key_code": "illumination_up" }]
                },
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "f9" },
                    "to": [{ "consumer_key_code": "fastforward" }]
                }
            ],
            "name": "MJ",
            "selected": true,
            "simple_modifications": [
                {
                    "from": { "key_code": "caps_lock" },
                    "to": [{ "key_code": "f18" }]
                }
            ],
            "virtual_hid_keyboard": {
                "country_code": 0,
                "keyboard_type_v2": "ansi"
            }
        }
    ]
}
```
